ygData.messageBody:
> If you put this in there change it, do not refer to
> a damage shield as a
> "Buff". Calling it a buff is bringing the Wizards
> closer to the other
> classes. Matter of fact I don't think this line of
> spells should confer ANY
> buff properties. It should merely cause damage to an
> attacking MOB and not
> provide any protection etc....

I must agree with this. Wizards are NOT
buffers/debuffers - there are other classes for this
task. However, since we are the masters of offense,
having an offense related shield like that is right up
our alley. It might add nice variety to have
fire/cold/water, etc. shields that do damage for every
attack, but don't confer any increase in AC etc.

Arcius
High Elven Wizard
